item.title: Implementing Notification Service with Amazon SNS in ASP.NET Core 8 API
item.description: Introduction In today’s digital world, businesses rely heavily on real-time communication to deliver information, alerts, and updates to users. Whether it’s notifying a customer about a successful transaction, sending alerts for system downtime, or marketing messages, the ability to deliver notifications effectively is crucial. This is where Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) comes into play, especially when integrated with a .NET Core 8 API. This blog will guide you through the process of implementing a notification service using Amazon SNS in a .
